stories.text:
Just an honest question I had... I would have thought that these hiring posts from YC companies would be a great vehicle to advertise their company product, culture, etc., especially since the posts themselves are artificially boosted.

Is it because they got flooded with negative comments about the company in question?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why are comments disabled for the “X is Hiring” posts?

stories.text: Any recommendations for a developer's business laptop?  Since it is for development I want something relatively powerful, e.g. Intel Core i7-11800H processor, 32GB RAM, 1TB NVMe drive.  However, since it is just for developing, I don't need a great video card.  Since takes a lot of gaming laptops out of the running since you are paying a premium for a graphics card that is just wasted.  Finally, since it is for professional use, it would be nice to have the option of extended warranty/support.  I would want to minimize downtime in the case of an issue so I can get back to work.
stories.title: Ask HN: Recommendations for a Developer's Business Laptop?
Of Scarface and the Nobel – The Double Life of Mariel
